body.initial_step: This tour will guide you through the main functions of the app to get you started quickly.
body.profile_step: In this area you can manage your profiles, and create multiple ones for different setups for quick access.
body.snapshot_step: This is where the magic happens, take snapshots to see your current net worth status!
body.group_step: Here you can group up with your friends to see your combined net worth status.
body.notifications_step: Everything that happens in the app will be displayed here.
